title: Tempting Her Fall
overview: A marriage alliance between two powerful families takes an unexpected turn when a mysterious figure shows up at the engagement party and shares a surprisingly intimate moment with the bride-to-be. Caught between family duty, tangled emotions, and a web of deceit, the bride is thrown into chaos. As the stranger's true motives slowly come to light, a gripping tale of revenge, love, and betrayal begins to unfold at the heart of a wealthy family's dark secrets.
